Articles.Title: Trump says anti-Tesla protesters will face 'hell'
Articles.Summary: People protesting against Tesla should be labelled domestic terrorists, says President Donald Trump. Trump sat in the driver's seat of a brand new red Tesla that he said he planned to buy, with Elon Musk in the passenger seat.

Articles.Title: Tesla makes largest-ever Cybertruck recall
Articles.Summary: The issue affects more than 46,000 trucks made starting in November 2023. It comes as Tesla grapples with falling sales amid a backlash against the firm.

Articles.Title: Tesla vandals face up to 20 years in prison, says attorney general
Articles.Summary: Tesla dealerships across the country have been targeted in a wave of protests, but also vandalism and arson attacks. There is no specific US law against domestic terrorism, but prosecutors can request longer prison sentences.

Articles.Title: Tesla's challenges run deeper than 'toxic' controversy around Elon Musk
Articles.Summary: Ben Kilbey runs a communications firm that promotes sustainable businesses in the UK. He disapproves vehemently of Tesla CEO Elon Musk's actions, especially the way he has handled firing US government employees.There have been protests outside dozens of Tesla dealerships. Tesla Cybertruck, an angular metallic pickup truck, has become a particular magnet for anti-Musk sentiment.Two decades ago, Tesla was a tiny Silicon Valley start-up. Today it is the best-selling producer of electric vehicles in a growing global market. It is also widely cr

Articles.Title: Musk's Tesla raises concern over Trump tariffs
Articles.Summary: Elon Musk is a close ally of the US president and is leading efforts to reduce the size of the federal government. Tesla said while it "supports" fair trade it was concerned US exporters were "exposed to disproportionate impacts"

Articles.Title: Musk's Tesla facilities in US face 'Takedown' protests
Articles.Summary: Most "Tesla Takedown" protests have been peaceful, but a few have been destructive. There has also been a spike in Cybertruck vandalism across the US. Some car owners are defacing their own Teslas in protest of Musk.

Articles.Title: Can Tesla's EVs win over India's price-conscious buyers?
Articles.Summary: The American electric vehicle (EV) giant has begun hiring for a dozen jobs in Delhi and Mumbai. It is also reportedly hunting for showrooms in both cities.

Articles.Title: Elon Musk meets defence officials in Pentagon visit
Articles.Summary: Elon Musk visits Pentagon for briefings on US plans in event of war with China. Tesla and SpaceX CEO's companies hold billions of dollars in federal defence contracts.

Articles.Title: Trump’s efforts to help Tesla could hurt it instead
Articles.Summary: Presidential tweets his support for Tesla CEO Elon Musk. Trump calls Musk a ‘great guy’ and says he is ‘proud’ of him.
